Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is BULGARIA. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 10 BG.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Pirin Mountains. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Bansko Municipality in Blagoevgrad Province (BG413).   The size of the area (km2) is 475.8. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is unspecified. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is unspecified. The total population (in thousand) is 12.827. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 26.96. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) is unspecified. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 103.70. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.01%.   The average per capita income (EUR/year) [Province] is 5000. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Province] is 1323. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 8.60%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 26.70%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 64.70%. The per capita income (EUR/year) [Region] is 12900. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Region] is 23579. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 1.20%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 16.10%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 82.60%.   The total number of bed places (BPs) in tourist accommodations/year in the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 14739. The regional (Region) share of total BPs/year is 39.90%. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 35160. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is unspecified. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 21.20%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 31.80%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 47.00%. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 6.40%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 21.10%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 72.50%.   Newest and most rapidly developing 'luxury' mountain resort in Bulgaria catering for both winter and summer mass tourism. Important part of the Balkan Holidays (tour operator) portfolio. Close to the UNESCO designated Pirin National Park.   N/A. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current. This VC is classified as Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is Exogenous. The innovation is related to New products, New processes and New marketing strategies. The land use systems involved are N/A. The local assets include Natural.
